title: ok halp
body: Everytime i play a game of league i make it about 1-2 minutes into a game before it crashes. I will be just playing and my screen will freeze, black screen, tab out, tab backing into the game and black screen but I can see my mouse and then it either lets me play and happens again in around 3 more minutes or just straight up crashes idk wtf to do and it makes the game unplayable.
